org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.session

Class LineageState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.session.LineageState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class LineageState
extends Object
implements Serializable
    LineageState. Contains all the information used to generate the lineage information for the post execution hooks.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • mapDirToOp

        public void mapDirToOp(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dir,
                       Operator fop)
        Adds a mapping from the load work to the file sink operator.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory name.
        fop - The sink operator.

      • updateDirToOpMap

        public void updateDirToOpMap(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path newPath,
                             org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path oldPath)
        Update the path of the captured lineage information in case the conditional input path and the linked MoveWork were merged into one MoveWork. This should only happen for Blobstore systems with optimization turned on.
        Parameters:
        newPath - conditional input path
        oldPath - path of the old linked MoveWork

      • setLineage

        public void setLineage(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path dir,
                       LineageInfo.DataContainer dc,
                       List<FieldSchema> cols)
        Set the lineage information for the associated directory.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory containing the query results.
        dc - The associated data container.
        cols - The list of columns.
